title: Cybersecurity Scenario-Based Practical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A process simultaneously enhancing technical security capabilities and communication skills through scenario-based learning reflecting real work environments

learning_goals: One can perform appropriate security response procedures with 90% accuracy by analyzing real-world attack scenarios
One can effectively perform role allocation and collaboration processes in team-based simulated incident response with over 80% efficiency
One can write system reports containing security vulnerabilities and develop communication strategies with stakeholders
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
